SEARCH
Package io.rhythmknights.coreframework.component.utility

Class TextUtility

java.lang.Object
io.rhythmknights.coreframework.component.utility.TextUtility
public class TextUtility extends Object
Single Source of Truth for all message formatting and sending across RhythmKnights plugins Handles both legacy and Adventure API formatting

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
      Initialize the message utility with a plugin instance
      Parameters:
      plugin - The plugin instance

    • close

      public static void close()
      Clean up resources when the plugin is disabled

    • parse

      public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component parse(String message)
      Parse a message to a Component, supporting both legacy and MiniMessage formats. Prioritizes MiniMessage. If legacy color codes are present, they will be processed by MiniMessage if configured to do so, or converted if only legacy is used.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to parse
      Returns:
      The parsed Component

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, String message)
      Send a message to a command sender
      Parameters:
      sender - The command sender to receive the message
      message - The message to send

      Send a message to a player
      Parameters:

      message - The message to send

    • broadcastMessage

      public static void broadcastMessage(String message)
      Broadcast a message to all players and console
      Parameters:
      message - The message to broadcast

    • processMessage

      public static String processMessage(String message)
      Process any message through the complete TextUtility system. This automatically handles prefix, scaled separators, and any other processing. It does *not* handle MiniMessage/legacy formatting tags, as 'parse' does that.
      Parameters:
      message - The raw message
      Returns:
      The fully processed message

    • replaceVariables

      public static String replaceVariables(String message, String... replacements)
      Replace variables in a message template
      Parameters:
      message - The message template
      replacements - Variable replacements (key-value pairs)
      Returns:
      The message with variables replaced

    • replaceVariablesWithPadding

      public static String replaceVariablesWithPadding(String message, String... replacements)
      Replace variables and handle dynamic padding for consistent line lengths
      Parameters:
      message - The message template
      replacements - Variable replacements (key-value pairs)
      Returns:
      The message with variables replaced and padding adjusted
